title: [Large-Scale] Impact of Instructor Presence via Avatars on Science Learning: Video Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science concepts and ability to use digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Targets working professionals with time constraints, aiming to strengthen science education content creation capabilities

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of avatar-based instructor presence on cognitive load with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze the influence of nonverbal cues from avatar instructors in VR environments on learning outcomes and document findings in a report.
Learners can design three or more effective avatar interaction strategies when explaining scientific concepts using simulation tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
